common.subtitle: Ready to revolutionize your style? Your personal fashion AI is here to transform how you dress.
common.description: Discover outfits you never imagined, get stunning style tips, and become a fashion icon.

home.title: Fashion Fit
home.subtitle: A smarter, calmer way to get dressed
home.description: Built to feel personal, not robotic. Discover outfits that actually fit your life, organize your wardrobe without the hassle, and get styling tips that feel like a friend’s advice.

aiWardrobe.title: AI Wardrobe
aiWardrobe.description: Snap a photo, we handle the rest. Clean organization without spreadsheets.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: Outfits that match your vibe, the weather, and where you’re headed—no guesswork.

styleAnalytics.title: Style Analytics
styleAnalytics.description: Gentle insights that help you find what you actually wear and love.

fashionStylist.title: AI Fashion Stylist
fashionStylist.description: Ask quick styling questions and get practical, friendly answers.

wardrobe.title: My Wardrobe
wardrobe.subtitle: Manage your clothing collection
wardrobe.uploadFirst: Upload some items to get started!

recommendations.title: AI Recommendations
recommendations.subtitle: Discover perfect combinations made just for you
recommendations.uploadItems: Upload some items to your wardrobe first to get personalized recommendations!

stylist.title: AI Fashion Stylist
stylist.subtitle: Chat with your personal fashion assistant
stylist.authRequired: Please sign in to use the Fashion Stylist
stylist.welcome: Hello {{name}}! I'm your AI fashion stylist. How can I help you with your style today?

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.description: Manage your privacy settings and data preferences.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Configure how you receive updates and alerts.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your fashion journey at a glance

activity.title: Your Fashion Journey Begins!
activity.welcome: Welcome to the future of fashion!
activity.revolution: Your AI-powered style revolution starts now
activity.checkEmail: Check your email for exclusive style tips!
activity.analyzing: AI is analyzing your style preferences

actions.title: Jump Into Action!
actions.uploadDesc: Transform photos into smart wardrobe items

weather.title: Perfect Weather for Style
weather.subtitle: Sunny & Perfect
weather.ideal: Ideal for light layers and vibrant colors!
weather.tip: Ideal for light layers and vibrant colors!

style.title: Style Secret of the Day
style.quote: Mix textures for visual interest - try pairing a smooth silk blouse with textured denim for an effortlessly chic look that screams sophistication!
style.note: This combination creates visual depth and sophistication.

auth.signInPrompt: Please sign in to access this feature.
